SEARCH
Package org.savingapp.service

Interface GenerateChallengeService

All Known Implementing Classes:
GenerateChallengeServiceImpl
public interface GenerateChallengeService
This interface defines the contract for generating challenge skeletons for the user. A challenge skeleton is a structure that outlines the challenge without the specific details. The details are filled in later based on the user's preferences and past behavior.
